name: Emotes-Showcase
description: Twitch extension that displays emotes of channel

scripts.build: zip -9 -y -r -q -j emotes-showcase.zip public/config.css public/config.html public/config.js public/panel.html public/polyfill.js public/viewer.css public/viewer.js public/model.js public/shared.css
